title: The Angry Hills (1959 - UK) [Robert Mitchum, Stanley Baker] WWII
description:
The Angry Hills (1959 - UK)

Drama / War / Thriller

director . . . . Robert Aldrich
starring . . . . Robert Mitchum, Stanley Baker, Elisabeth MÃ¼ller
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0052563/


Filmed at Athens, Greece

Set in Athens in 1941, before the Nazis overran the country, Robert Mitchum plays American war correspondent Mike Morrison, who has come into the possession of a list of 16 Greek underground leaders that he agrees to deliver to British intelligence in London for a $20,000 fee. Trying to keep him from getting there is the local Gestapo chief Conrad Heisler and fifth columnist Tassos.


Video: DivX5, 528x304, 25.000 fps, 853 Kbps, 01h41m46s
Audio: MP3, 32000 Hz, stereo, 91 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, optional Dutch and German subtitles
